org.assertj.core.util

类 ArrayWrapperList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<Object>
        • org.assertj.core.util.ArrayWrapperList
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<Object>, Collection<Object>, List<Object>

    public class ArrayWrapperList
extends AbstractList<Object>
    A list-like wrapper for arrays. This class does not provide type-safety in order to handle both arrays of objects and arrays of primitives.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.util.AbstractList

        modCount

    • 方法详细资料

      • wrap

        public static ArrayWrapperList wrap(Object array)
        Wraps a given array with a ArrayWrapperList
        参数:
        array - the array to wrap.
        返回:
        the wrapped array or null if the given array was already null.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the array is not an array.
